trans-unit.source: Step 1: Create a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Create a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Step 1 of the Develop a predictive solution walkthrough: Learn how to set up a new Azure Machine Learning Studio workspace.
trans-unit.target: Step 1 of the Develop a predictive solution walkthrough: Learn how to set up a new Azure Machine Learning Studio workspace.

trans-unit.source: Walkthrough Step 1: Create a Machine Learning workspace
trans-unit.target: Walkthrough Step 1: Create a Machine Learning workspace

trans-unit.source: This is the first step of the walkthrough, <link><linkText>Develop a Predictive Solution with Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: This is the first step of the walkthrough, <link><linkText>Develop a Predictive Solution with Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Create a Machine Learning workspace
trans-unit.target: Create a Machine Learning workspace

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Upload existing data</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Upload existing data</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Create a new experiment</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Create a new experiment</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Train and evaluate the models</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Train and evaluate the models</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Publish the web service</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Publish the web service</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Access the web service</linkText><title></title></link>
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Access the web service</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: To use Machine Learning Studio, you need to have a Microsoft Azure Machine Learning workspace.
trans-unit.target: To use Machine Learning Studio, you need to have a Microsoft Azure Machine Learning workspace.

trans-unit.source: This workspace contains the tools you need to create, manage, and publish experiments.
trans-unit.target: This workspace contains the tools you need to create, manage, and publish experiments.

trans-unit.source: To create a workspace
trans-unit.target: To create a workspace

trans-unit.source: Sign in to your Microsoft Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Sign in to your Microsoft Azure account.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure services panel, click MACHINE LEARNING.
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure services panel, click MACHINE LEARNING.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create workspace</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create workspace</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Click CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE.
trans-unit.target: Click CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE.

trans-unit.source: On the QUICK CREATE page, enter your workspace information and then click CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE.
trans-unit.target: On the QUICK CREATE page, enter your workspace information and then click CREATE AN ML WORKSPACE.

trans-unit.source: The WORKSPACE OWNER is your Microsoft account (e.g., name@outlook.com) or organizational account.
trans-unit.target: The WORKSPACE OWNER is your Microsoft account (e.g., name@outlook.com) or organizational account.

trans-unit.source: After your Machine Learning workspace is created, you will see it listed on the machine learning page.
trans-unit.target: After your Machine Learning workspace is created, you will see it listed on the machine learning page.

trans-unit.source: You can share the experiments you're working on by inviting others to your workspace.
trans-unit.target: You can share the experiments you're working on by inviting others to your workspace.

trans-unit.source: You can do this in Machine Learning Studio on the SETTINGS page.
trans-unit.target: You can do this in Machine Learning Studio on the SETTINGS page.

trans-unit.source: You just need the Microsoft account or organizational account for each user.
trans-unit.target: You just need the Microsoft account or organizational account for each user.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link><linkText>Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link><linkText>Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: **Next: <link><linkText>Upload existing data</linkText><title></title></link>**
trans-unit.target: **Next: <link><linkText>Upload existing data</linkText><title></title></link>**
